forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address below and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
forgotPassword.errorMessage: There was an error sending the instructions. Please try again.
forgotPassword.instructions: You'll receive an email with a link to reset your password. Please check your inbox.
forgotPassword.successMessage: Instructions to reset your password have been sent to your email.
forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
